org.apache.flink.client.program

类 DetachedEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment
      • org.apache.flink.client.program.ContextEnvironment
        • org.apache.flink.client.program.DetachedEnvironment

  • public class DetachedEnvironment
extends ContextEnvironment
    Execution Environment for remote execution with the Client in detached mode.

    • 方法详细资料

      • execute

        public JobExecutionResult execute(java.lang.String jobName)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: ExecutionEnvironment
        Triggers the program execution. The environment will execute all parts of the program that have resulted in a "sink" operation. Sink operations are for example printing results (DataSet.print(), writing results (e.g. DataSet.writeAsText(String), DataSet.write(org.apache.flink.api.common.io.FileOutputFormat, String), or other generic data sinks created with DataSet.output(org.apache.flink.api.common.io.OutputFormat).

        The program execution will be logged and displayed with the given job name.

        覆盖:
        execute 在类中 ContextEnvironment
        返回:
        The result of the job execution, containing elapsed time and accumulators.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the program executions fails.

      • setDetachedPlan

        public void setDetachedPlan(FlinkPlan plan)

      • finalizeExecute

        JobSubmissionResult finalizeExecute()
                             throws ProgramInvocationException
        Finishes this Context Environment's execution by explicitly running the plan constructed.
        抛出:
        ProgramInvocationException
